title: Trust in Me
description: This book takes place three years after Timeout, book 5. Brina has been running the Kingston Foundation for two years now. The Kingston Foundation is a trust set up in her brother’s memory to ensure veterans get the mental health care they need. When Brina meets a guy who served with her brother and finds out he’s homeless, she invites him over for dinner. Will Brina’s need to help others get her in trouble with Luke again?
author: Cassia Leo
